What is the role of nightgaunts in the Dreamlands?
Nightgaunts serve Nodens by, among other things, grasping and carrying off intruders, who are unceremoniously dumped in the most dismal and horrible places imaginable, and left to die.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where are nightgaunts typically stationed?
Nightgaunts are stationed at various spots in the lonely parts of the Dreamlands.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When do nightgaunts come out to seek their prey?
Nightgaunts come out at night to seek their prey.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the behavior of nightgaunts when they encounter prey?
All they ever did was clutch and fly and tickle; that was the way of nightgaunts.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Do nightgaunts ever speak or laugh?
They never spoke or laughed, and never smiled because they had no faces at all to smile with, but only a suggestive blankness where a face ought to be.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What do Nightgaunts serve Nodens by?
grasping and carrying off intruders
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where are Nightgaunts stationed?
various spots in the lonely parts of the Dreamlands
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the intelligence level of Nightgaunts?
not very intelligent
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can Nightgaunts understand some languages?
some languages, such as the gibberings of ghouls

Can nightgaunts tickle their opponents?
Yes, but only if their opponent has already been seized
